title: HOUR 2 - Trent Dilfer
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Trent Dilfer
description:
Trent Dilfer joins the 2nd hour to talk Matt Rhule and if he should go back to College coaching after being fired by the Panthers. Coaches using analytics to hide behind bad play calling. And the LA Rams went all in to win a Super Bowl, but there will be a price to pay for that. And it looks like they're paying it now while being thin on the offensive side of the ball.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Trent Dilfer joins the 2nd hour to talk Matt Rhule and if he should go back to College coaching after being fired by the Panthers. Coaches using analytics to hide behind bad play calling. And the LA Rams went all in to win a Super Bowl, but there will be a price to pay for that. And it looks like they're paying it now while being thin on the offensive side of the ball.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
